description.sellers: Have you ever wondered why people use cheats? Do they play for victory or for the process? And what are their motives? What are cheats? First of all, let's define the concept.

message: Please check your email. We have sent you a message with instructions to verify your account. To complete your registration, you need to click the link in that email. If you didn’t receive the email, please check your spam folder or request a resend.

detect.info: This tab contains the history of known detections for the presented product. Keep in mind that the banning of a game account can depend on three factors: improper use of the product by the client (1), detection of third-party software by the game developer (2), and the coder's dishonesty and/or low skill level in cheat development (3).
